skos:Concept.skos:definition: {"id": "5d40f6f5-f724-4b1d-8326-63549c466e45", "value": "A woman who adopts a child of other parents and takes the child as her own."}

{"id": "defdf331-623d-4ec7-aab8-70df0aa4a2ba", "value": "A man who is the husband or partner of one's mother (or in a same-sex relationship - father) after the divorce or separation of one's parents or the death of one's father (or mother)."}

skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:description: {"id": "7a600675-8769-4c18-91ea-0b7ca44e5110", "value": "Type of relationships found between children and their parents"}

skos:Concept.skos:definition: {"id": "d6642058-6e94-45ae-a820-f7631db33595", "value": "A woman who is the wife or partner of one's father (or in a same-sex relationship - mother) after the divorce or separation of one's parents or the death of one's mother (or father)."}

skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:title: {"id": "51a76216-fdfd-4e09-9018-909e364b5722", "value": "MIDAS Parentage"}

skos:Concept.skos:definition: {"id": "5df67da3-f979-4a8d-a49d-8814b249227d", "value": "A man who adopts a child of other parents and takes the child as his own."}
